original_title: UFC Fight Night 47: Bader vs. St. Preux
overview: UFC Fight Night 47: Bader vs. St. Preux was a mixed martial arts event held on August 16, 2014, at the Cross Insurance Center in Bangor, Maine. The event was headlined by top ten light heavyweights Ryan Bader and Ovince Saint Preux.
title: UFC Fight Night 47: Bader vs. St. Preux
